lead_paragraph: FRIEDMAN--Ethel. 1915-2016. of Scarsdale, NY, died on Thursday, March 17, 2016. She passed away peacefully at 100 years old. She was born on April 17, 1915, in New York City to Pearl Saqui and David Zimmerman. Ethel was married to Arnold Friedman for 60 years, and together they raised their family in Scarsdale, NY. She touched many people throughout her life and was a beloved mother, grandmother and friend. She is survived by her three children Diane, David and Nancy, her three grandchildren, Jenny, Jake and Max and her son-in-law Fred. Shiva will be held Sunday, March 20, at the home of Nancy Poses at 7 Hubert Street, New York, NY from 2pm-6pm. Relatives and friends are welcome to attend. Memorial contributions are welcome and should be sent to Congregation Kol Ami in White Plains, NY or to the National Center for Learning Disabilities (NCLD). 1/3
